features: Sterno’s Folding Stove is ideal for camping, picnics, or emergencies, offering a reliable and portable cooking solution for various outdoor scenarios
Quick and easy setup, featuring a compact design that measures 6-1/4" long by 6-3/8" wide by 4-5/8" high when assembled, making it a breeze to carry along for outdoor adventures
Constructed with a corrosion-resistant frame to ensure long-lasting performance even in rugged outdoor environments
Equipped with panels to shield against wind, maintaining consistent heat for efficient cooking in various conditions
Pair with Sterno Green Canned Heat for optimal and eco-friendly heat generation during cooking sessions
body.description: Explore the convenience of Sterno’s Folding Stove, an essential for camping, picnics, or unexpected situations, providing a reliable and portable cooking solution for any outdoor excursion. A compact design measuring 6-1/4" long by 6-3/8" wide by 4-5/8" high when assembled make it perfect for on-the-go use. Fold it up and pack it away in your backpack or keep one in your car for emergencies. Its corrosion-resistant frame ensures durability even in rugged outdoor settings, while the integrated wind shield heat panels maintain consistent heat for efficient cooking in varying conditions. Whether you’re hiking through nature or making dinner during a blackout, this folding stove is an indispensable piece of gear to have on hand. For optimal and eco-friendly heat generation, complement your cooking experience by pairing this stove with Sterno Green Canned Heat. For over 100 years, can after can, Sterno ensures food is hot, safe and delicious when it comes out of the kitchen.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #82,835 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors) #219 in Camping Stoves

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very lightweight and compact
reviews.reviewText: These mini stoves are great to have for camping or in an emergency. They are very lightweight and folds up to be very compact. They are super simple to fold, unfold and use. The fact that you can get a 2 pack for the asking price is also impressive. These are made from decent quality materials that are on par with the price point. You do get what you pay for, meaning you won't get many years of use from this item, but you also won't be heartbroken when you need to replace it. I do wish they were slightly taller, but that's the sacrifice made for keeping the unit so compact. I rate this at 5 stars for value, quality, and ease of use. It's worth having on hand in those "just in case" scenarios.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for emergencies!
reviews.reviewText: These little foldable stoves by Sterno are great to keep around for power outages or to take camping, hiking etc. They are sturdy and well built. They collapse easily for storage so they don't take up a lot of space when not in use.They are to be used with Sterno fuel, but are designed in such a way that you could use alternative fuel sources in a pinch if needed. They are sturdy when set up and easily support your average size sauce pan. For the pans I have, I wouldn't go above a 3 quart size and expect it to be able to efficiently heat the pan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hurricane stash necessity
reviews.reviewText: I live in South Florida so hurricanes are a thing. Losing power for days or weeks on end SUCKS for various reasons, one being the lack of cooking methods. I live in an apartment so full sized grills are not allowed. This is my solution. They come folded up so small and lightweight that they take up almost no space at all. You could easily stash them in a drawer. It does not come with the Sterno fuel packs, so you will need to purchase those separately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Compact for Camping
reviews.reviewText: This little stove is a good thing to have around for emergencies. It folds flat so it stores easily in your emergency box. It is also perfect for camping and picnics since it is so small and easy to carry. You can use it with Sterno fuel, or even with small sticks and other dried plant material. It does a good job of blocking the wind, and the silver reflective material magnifies the heat. Be careful though, as the metal gets very hot. Fun to take this along for hikes to prepare coffee or tea in a natural setting. Tranquil and relaxing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't go wrong with a classic.
reviews.reviewText: Anyone who likes camping or lives in a disaster zone (looking at you, gulf coast) should have a couple of these on hand or stowed away. These stoves have been around forever, and for good reason. They're ultra small and light when folded up, and support a range of heating gel cans (assuming you buy the standard can size.) They compress really well into a pack or an emergency kit and can be used to cook or heat water, if it comes to it. Sure, you could improvise a portable folding stove with some spare metal, but the Sterno does it better. Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Meets the target use cases well
reviews.reviewText: RECOMMENDATION:Thumbs up – good choice for tailgating or emergency preparedness.THE GOOD:1. You can assemble the stove in under 30 seconds and is pretty easy even without instructions.2. It is lightweight and under 1.5” thick folded.3. The flames are mostly protected from the wind, but a really strong wind could still knock it out.4. The silver metal walls also reflect the radiated heat, so heats your hands up pretty well too.5. Pretty basic unit but works well.THE BAD:1. The sterno can weighs more than the stove, but no way around that.2. The walls do get pretty hot during use, so don’t touch them and you will have to wait for them to cool down before packing it up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect! Just like I remember....
reviews.reviewText: I've been putting together an emergency kit for the car with blankets, food, water, etc and needed a way to heat food. I saw these and lots of hiking memories came back and I had to order them....these are perfect for what I needed. They're sturdy, fold up for easy storage and don't take up much room at all in the tote. Hubby loves them, brings back fond memories, so he's picking up some cans of Sterno to throw in and have at the ready. Thanks to these our car emergency kit is almost complete. Never know when a night of car camping will present itself, lol. 😉

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Neat little emergency stoves
reviews.reviewText: Love these little sterno stoves. They fold up SO small. I haven't actually tested them because I have to wait for my green canned heat fuel to arrive, but I have used Sterno products in the past and I'm familiar with their high quality nature. Dropping one of these into my my emergency "bug-out" bag in the house and another in the emergency supplies in the car. Love that they are so light and small, yet made of sturdy metal able to block the wind and serve as a great stove in emergency situations (like when the power goes out!).
